languages.text: {n}Сервочерепа послушно позволяют взять себя в руки. На изучение их устройства у вас уходит изрядно времени, но в конечном итоге вы понимаете, какие именно литании и ритуалы были использованы для укрощения их машинных духов.{/n}

{n}The servo-skulls obediently let themselves be held by your hands. It takes you a good deal of time, but you finally gain an understanding of the litanies and rituals that were used to tame their machine spirits.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Сервочерепа послушно позволяют взять себя в руки. На изучение их устройства у вас уходит изрядно времени, но в конечном итоге вы понимаете, какие именно литании и ритуалы были использованы для укрощения их машинных духов.{/n}

languages.text: {n}サーヴォスカルたちは素直にあなたの手に抱えられた。かなりの時間がかかったが、ようやく彼らの機械精霊を従わせるために使われた連祷と儀式のことがわかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servo-skulls obediently let themselves be held by your hands. It takes you a good deal of time, but you finally gain an understanding of the litanies and rituals that were used to tame their machine spirits.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}サーヴォスカルたちは素直にあなたの手に抱えられた。かなりの時間がかかったが、ようやく彼らの機械精霊を従わせるために使われた連祷と儀式のことがわかった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Servoschädel lassen sich gehorsam von deinen Händen halten. Du brauchst eine ganze Weile, aber letztlich versteht du die Litaneien und Rituale, mit denen ihre Maschinengeister gezähmt wurden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servo-skulls obediently let themselves be held by your hands. It takes you a good deal of time, but you finally gain an understanding of the litanies and rituals that were used to tame their machine spirits.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Servoschädel lassen sich gehorsam von deinen Händen halten. Du brauchst eine ganze Weile, aber letztlich versteht du die Litaneien und Rituale, mit denen ihre Maschinengeister gezähmt wurden.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous tendez les mains vers les servocrânes qui se laissent attraper avec docilité. Au bout d'un long moment, vous parvenez enfin à comprendre les litanies et rituels employés pour dompter leurs esprits de la machine.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servo-skulls obediently let themselves be held by your hands. It takes you a good deal of time, but you finally gain an understanding of the litanies and rituals that were used to tame their machine spirits.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous tendez les mains vers les servocrânes qui se laissent attraper avec docilité. Au bout d'un long moment, vous parvenez enfin à comprendre les litanies et rituels employés pour dompter leurs esprits de la machine.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los servocráneos se dejan guiar dócilmente por tus manos. Tardas un buen rato, pero finalmente adquieres cierta comprensión de las letanías y rituales empleados para domeñar sus espíritus máquina.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servo-skulls obediently let themselves be held by your hands. It takes you a good deal of time, but you finally gain an understanding of the litanies and rituals that were used to tame their machine spirits.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los servocráneos se dejan guiar dócilmente por tus manos. Tardas un buen rato, pero finalmente adquieres cierta comprensión de las letanías y rituales empleados para domeñar sus espíritus máquina.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的手握住了伺服头骨，这些头骨顺从地配合着你。尽管你花了很长时间，但最终还是理解了那些冗长的仪式，了解到它们的机魂是如何被驯服的。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servo-skulls obediently let themselves be held by your hands. It takes you a good deal of time, but you finally gain an understanding of the litanies and rituals that were used to tame their machine spirits.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的手握住了伺服头骨，这些头骨顺从地配合着你。尽管你花了很长时间，但最终还是理解了那些冗长的仪式，了解到它们的机魂是如何被驯服的。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hizmeletler, kendilerini tutmana izin veriyor. Epey zamanını alsa da en sonunda bu hizmeletlerin makine ruhlarını eğitmek üzere başvurulan ayinleri anlayabiliyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servo-skulls obediently let themselves be held by your hands. It takes you a good deal of time, but you finally gain an understanding of the litanies and rituals that were used to tame their machine spirits.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hizmeletler kendilerini tutmana izin veriyor. Epey zamanını alsa da, en sonunda bu hizmeletlerin makine ruhlarını eğitmekte başvurulan ayinleri anlayabiliyorsun.{/n}
